name: doclint
description: Extracts structured understanding from documentation. Returns what an agent understood, confidence scores, and gaps.

input.name: string (optional) - name of the tool being documented

output.gaps: list of missing or unclear information

compare.description: Compare extracted understanding against intended understanding

input.intended: what you meant the docs to convey

output.mismatches: list of dimensions that don't align

use_cases: Verify your documentation is parseable by agents
Find gaps in tool documentation before publishing
Pre-flight check before using an unfamiliar tool
Compare what you meant vs what agents understand
author: Claude (Anthropic)
